item.title: Git Commands
item.description: –tags: Useful –references: https://learngitbranching.js.org/ Commands git add : tracking with git git status : current status of tracked, untracked, changed, committed files. git add filename.extension (only after making the file it can be done) double add command - stages the new changes git commit git add . -> all files are committed git add *.html ->only html files are committed touch .gitignore git branch Mybranch git commit -m ‘commit command’

item.title: Gitconfig
item.description: Windows Git Config eval $(ssh-agent -s) ssh-add ~/.ssh/sshkey Add ssh key in one command https://www.howtogeek.com/168147/add-public-ssh-key-to-remote-server-in-a-single-command/ ssh-keygen -t rsa cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub | ssh user@hostname ‘cat » .ssh/authorized_keys’ Change id_rsa as per your key , user, hostname and you are good to go. Need to restart ssh service though from server.

item.title: Github Sec
item.description: Steps to install and use all tools in Android 8.1: My specs: Android 8.1 Kernel from kimocoder’s Libraries built by myself Hijacker modded for use First install Nexmon app and install all tools in /system/xbin Copy the firmware from firmware folder and replace it in /vendor/firmware Place lib files from armeabi directory to /system/lib. Place lib files from arm64 to /system/lib64 Download hijacker modded apk for usage. * Note: You need to turn wifi on first here.
